video_prompt: The vast cityscape shifts, and a colossal red ring pulsates with turquoise light. A lone, robed figure turns slowly, their garment rippling. A shimmering blue-white energy streak undulates and intensifies, its glittering particles swirling. Distant red rings shimmer in and out of the shifting urban haze.

refined_video_prompt:
The original prompt is already excellent at focusing exclusively on movement and change, avoiding static descriptions. Here's a slightly refined version to emphasize the active elements even further, while remaining concise:

The vast cityscape actively shifts. A colossal red ring pulsates, radiating turquoise light. A robed figure slowly turns, their garment rippling. A shimmering blue-white energy streak undulates, intensifying as glittering particles swirl. Distant red rings shimmer into and out of the shifting urban haze.
